attributes.title: Laziness – The Biggest Destruction in Enlightenment
attributes.description:
Satsang delivered on 14th October 2019

Brief summary: 

Thousands and thousands of seekers lose their path not because of lust, but because of laziness. Nothing else is the bigger destruction or a blockage in enlightenment than laziness.

“Trust on Paramashiva.” Understanding the whole universe is orderly, zillion circuses and getting overwhelmed because of the intensity, the strength you get, that grounds you so well, makes explosion of bliss in your system. Trust on Paramashiva will ground you and heal you. It will remove the laziness and tantrums you throw because of laziness. Trust on Paramashiva will make your skin glow. Because inside you are so full, your whole being will start shining!
